item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: Just launched: @Powerloom Mainnet, the L2 that gives builders the onchain data they need.
Powerloom is built on @Optimism OP Stack, settles on Ethereum, and uses @eigen_da for data availability, plus @superbridgeapp for native bridge UI.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Just launched: @Powerloom Mainnet, the L2 that gives builders the onchain data they need.

Powerloom is built on @Optimism OP Stack, settles on Ethereum, and uses @eigen_da for data availability, plus @superbridgeapp for native bridge UI.

nitter.freedit.eu/Powerloom/status/1877485168241311883#m

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: Holocene also live on all the @conduitxyz networks
We've upgraded to Holocene 27 @Optimism mainnets, spanning across multiple configurations
- l2/l3s - eth blobs and alt-da (@celestia and @eigen_da) - with ETH and custom gas tokens
Seamlessly ‚ú®
item.dc:creator: @emilianobonassi
item.description:

item.dc:creator: @privy_io
item.description:
The next generation of rollup infrastructure is here.

@PhalaNetwork launched the first ever OP Succinct L2 using @conduitxyz's rollup platform with end-to-end infrastructure solutions, including @privy_io's integrated wallets.

Excited to see these teams bring this to life üëè

nitter.freedit.eu/conduitxyz/status/1877054456698753408#m

item.dc:creator: @ratankaliani
item.description:
OP Succinct is live on mainnet today!

Has been incredible working with @PhalaNetwork and @conduitxyz (s/o to @emilianobonassi @forrestnorwood @KAndrewHuang @marvin_tong @bgmshana) on launching the first OP Stack chain secured by Succinct on Mainnet.

@PhalaNetwork has pioneered some great research into the viability of verifiable + private AI with TEE's, excited to continue to partner with them into the future.

nitter.freedit.eu/SuccinctLabs/status/1877058317115138181#m

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: Phala Network 2.0 has arrived.
We're launching the very first OP Succinct Layer 2 on Ethereum, in collaboration with @SuccinctLabs and @conduitxyz: https://bit.ly/PhalaNewEra
Dive into this üßµ about this next-gen infrastructure, and the groundbreaking tool: Phala Cloud.

Dive into this üßµ about this next-gen infrastructure, and the groundbreaking tool: Phala Cloud.

item.title:
The first ZK-proven OP Stack rollup is live on mainnet in collaboration with @PhalaNetwork and @SuccinctLabs
Fault proofs have long finality delays and high bond requirements which make the technology hard to access
ZK proofs democratize access to security and speed up finality, and therefore interopability. Excited to make history with these teams
item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang
item.description:
The first ZK-proven OP Stack rollup is live on mainnet in collaboration with @PhalaNetwork and @SuccinctLabs

Fault proofs have long finality delays and high bond requirements which make the technology hard to access

ZK proofs democratize access to security and speed up finality, and therefore interopability. Excited to make history with these teams

nitter.freedit.eu/conduitxyz/status/1877054456698753408#m

item.title: Rollups enable you to: - Internalize fees (either as rev, or translating onchain costs into cloud server costs) - Customize the environment to enable unique onchain applications - Scale far past shared layer limitations (of which a single server will always have a vertical scaling limit)
item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang
item.description:
Rollups enable you to:
- Internalize fees (either as rev, or translating onchain costs into cloud server costs)
- Customize the environment to enable unique onchain applications
- Scale far past shared layer limitations (of which a single server will always have a vertical scaling limit)

nitter.freedit.eu/muir_eth/status/1876668657675424194#m
